remarks: The predicate "is a projective subspace".  (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2011.)
statement:
psubspset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
psubspset.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
psubspset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
psubspset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
ispsubsp $p |- ( K e. D -> ( X e. S <-> ( X C_ A /\ A. p e. X A. q e. X A. r e. A ( r .<_ ( p .\/ q ) -> r e. X ) ) ) ) $.
$d A r $.
$d A r $.
$d K p q r $.
$d K p q r $.
$d X p q r $.
